website_summaries.verdict: The speedy Visioneer RoadWarrior X3 manual-feed scanner is a great value, offering good OCR performance and a suite of capable programs that, if purchased on their own, would cost several times as much as the scanner itself.
pros: Strong value for what you get
High speed for a manual-feed scanner

website_summaries.verdict: The Visioneer RoadWarrior 3 sticks to the basics for a lightweight, portable scanner, with simplex (one-sided) scanning, a manual feed, excellent software, and a low price.
pros: Comes with excellent PDF utility and optical character recognition program
cons: Connectors for scanning to cloud services have to be downloaded

customer_reviews.title: Visioneer Continues It's Excellent Performance in Mobile Products
customer_reviews.text: We had previously owned a Visioneer Road Warrior Document Scanner and had been very pleased with it's performance. Based on our history with the product line--we went ahead and ordered the RW3-WU. It's even better than it's predecessor. It automatically straightens what you've scanned. Scanned documents are easily saved in PDF format. Instructions for set up and use are pretty easy to understand. The scanner comes with a storage pouch & cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sarabia

customer_reviews.title: Really a road warior
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner to take with you on the road. Had a few problems with software setup but these were sorted out quickly. Since then the unit has worked and worked and worked. Excellent scanner
customer_reviews.author: NOSREME

customer_reviews.title: Great compact sheet scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Has proven to be a great little scanner with a lot of capability. Was afraid it wouldn't be a good replacement for my old flatbed scanner but it's been great. Very compact and easy to use, and the bundled software is really awesome. From business cards, to register receipts, to legal, it does a great job on many different paper sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was something I had considered for a very long time. This scanner is wonderful. The time it saves, on a daily basis, will pay for itself in no time. This truely is a plug and play scanner. Very easy to use. I would recommend this scanner to anyone that needs to save time on the road, or in the office for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I thought a mobile scanner would make it easy for me to get documents scanned quickly. This Visioneer RoadWarrior 3 just doesn't work most of the time. It works the first time, but when I plug in the USB cable later, it says "Scanner not found" most of the time and the computer never finds it. Visioneer supposedly has updated its software to allow for better connections with Windows 8, but it doesn't work and I've given up on these mobile scanners. It's useless when the computer can't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Wojcicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is exactly what I needed! Once I got used to the software (not that hard), it's a breeze. Now, it's plug and play. I've scanned documents, credit cards, and ID's. Very well built unit!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: We have 20+ of the older units in place and have used them for many years with great results. I assumed this newer model would b
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement for our older Roadwarriors we use back in July of this year, but ended up not needing to put into service. I just installed it fresh out of the box and it absolutely will not scan a piece of paper without it hanging on the back set of rollers as it attempts to feed through the unit. We have 20+ of the older units in place and have used them for many years with great results. I assumed this newer model would be a step up. Unfortunately, I was incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Kara

customer_reviews.title: not good a time consuming problem
customer_reviews.text: Needed phone help to get it going. Some new computers have support for USB Ver3 our new ones don't needed support to get the RW3-WU to work, not good a time consuming problem. Once wouring it was OK
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Orten

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: Better image quality than i expected. In fact, better than the giant multi function machine we have in the office. I have put everything from crinkled receipts, business cards, photos, and printed out emails through this thing and all the images are text searchable. It did take an extra few minutes to figure out how to switch between PDF and JPEG. In summary, Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spiros papadapolous

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Takes up very little space on desk. For my needs, scanning receipts and individual sheets of paper, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tucker

customer_reviews.title: We love the size and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 2 years now and use it for scaning all bills, receipts, medical records and other documents to PDF. We love the size and ease of use. Rarely is there a tracking issue. Quality of scan is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D Bealer

customer_reviews.title: Love my scanner!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have scanned thousands of pictures and have almost digitized all of my printed pictures. Now onto scanning warranties, instructions and important paperwork. Hope to be paperless soon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. A little bit of set up required.
customer_reviews.author: Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy. My business staff attmeped to hook this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. My business staff attmeped to hook this up, along with myself. Then I hired my IT tech guy, was charged $100 and was told it was faulty. It would not even turn on. Then I was not allowed to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Don't buy. I tried two times at installing the scanner. I had an older version which worked great on Windows XP.
customer_reviews.author: anthony farina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unable to load software to Windows 7 computer. Returned scanner
customer_reviews.author: Martha H.

customer_reviews.title: BUt we have 5 of them works great.
customer_reviews.text: the speed is little slow. BUt we have 5 of them works great.
customer_reviews.author: eddie42469

customer_reviews.title: so good.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Replacement for one I had for years. Plug and play. So far... so good.
customer_reviews.author: fred stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scans ok bit doesn't ley me fill doc like paperPort does not real happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hand held scanner. Easy set up, converts your scan to a pdf file.
customer_reviews.author: dennis engel

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STORAGE SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: I love having this portable and compact scanner sitting close to my hand on the road or office. Allowing me to scan high or low document volumes to help me organize and arrange my most valuable financial or business records. I like the fact that it is not ac but USB powered for a simple one cable hookup. I have been feeding two sided documents effortlessly and the quality of all documents have been dead on. The included software, uses PDF converter Pro controls, edits and saves to most cloud services quickly Acrobat Pro when scanning documents. One final thing, This durable Visioner scanner exceeds my expectations when it comes to a one bottom touch system.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The best support ever. Use everyday for four year no issues. When have a question support is right there for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Crocker

product_meta.title: Visioneer RoadWarrior 3 Simplex Mobile Document Scanner, Black/white
product_meta.description: Quickly scan contracts receipts financial statements and more with the Visioneer RoadWarrior 3 Simplex Mobile Document Scanner Ideal for business travel this mobile scanner creates single-sided color scans at a speed of 11 seconds per page Weighing less than a pound this lightweight travel scanner is powered through your laptop’s USB 2 0 port for operation without an external power supply Compatible with both Macs and PCs this portable mobile scanner comes with software that delivers automatic image enhancement optical character recognition (OCR) searchable PDF files and easy file organization to help you stay productive on the go
feature_bullets: Mobile simplex scanner for documents photos receipts and more
Maximum ADF paper size 8 5 by 32 inches minimum ADF paper size 1 5 by 1 5 inches
Scans one-sided at a rate of 11 seconds per page at 300 dpi
Portable mobile scanner measures 11 4 by 2 2 by 1 5 inches and weighs 0 84 pound
Compatible with PC and Mac with included drivers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars42 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
